item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m currently a full-stack engineer with complete software lifecycle experiences in both large companies and startup environments. I first started programming in the late 90s by making Java applets for old-school D&D-style MUD games and have dabbled in multiple languages and frameworks ever since.
